EmailTemplate.name: BDC DYK- Underlying Fund Holders
EmailTemplate.subject: Ipreo- Did You Know?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Underlying Fund Holders Report
Would you like to quickly download institutional holders along with underlying fund positions?
Solution:
You can easily generate this deliverable in Excel with a few clicks in Ownership within BD Corporate.
Click here to access a Quick Guide that details this streamlined workflow within BD Corporate. Please contact your dedicated Account Manager to receive a more personalized consultation on how to analyze Institutional and Fund-level ownership in the BD Corporate Platform.
Jorge Mere Account Manager Jorge.mere@ipreo.com
212-849-3780
